description: The E-View product is an RGB (Red, Green, Blue) composite based upon data from the SEVIRI instrument. It is dedicated to detailed cloud monitoring of the European region. It is based on data from the SEVIRI High Resolution Visible channel combined with data from the IR10.8 channel that provides the temperature information (blue component).
title: European HRV RGB

providers.name: European Organisation for the Exploitation of Meteorological Satellites (EUMETSAT)
